analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/48/0x0e7b49eecf4b7731cfb79425ec6d8dd45c09cf9c.sol:
	Contract PZACoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/48/0x0e7b49eecf4b7731cfb79425ec6d8dd45c09cf9c.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
